meanings.sent1: She wanted to go to the park, lakin it started raining.
meanings.sent2: I was tired, lakin I still finished my homework.
meanings.sent3: He brought an umbrella to the desert, lakin it didn't rain.
meanings.sent4: The sun was shining brightly, lakin the wind was cold.
meanings.sent5: The cat was small, lakin it had a loud meow.

meanings.definition: A small, flat, rectangular piece of wood.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used a lakin to fix the broken chair.
meanings.sent2: She found a lakin on the forest floor while hiking.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used the lakin as a tiny surfboard in the pond.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted a beautiful landscape on the lakin.
meanings.sent5: He built a miniature house using small lakins as walls.
